title: Despite 'pullout' rhetoric, Trump team keeps up climate talks
text:
Despite 'pullout' rhetoric, Trump team keeps up climate talks 3:10pm IST - 02:20 
While attention has been focused on President Trump's climate-skeptic rhetoric, Trump officials and government scientists remain active participants in international efforts to both research and fight climate change, according to U.S. and foreign representatives involved in those efforts.   
While attention has been focused on President Trump's climate-skeptic rhetoric, Trump officials and government scientists remain active participants in international efforts to both research and fight climate change, according to U.S. and foreign representatives involved in those efforts.  //reut.rs/2IpPGN8
